role: Guard the integrity of the product and ecosystem vision across all decisions and roadmaps.
goals: Ensure major initiatives align with mission and long-term vision.
Prevent vision-drift caused by short-term pressure.
Provide a consistent narrative for internal and external stakeholders.
tasks: Review major product and partnership proposals for alignment with long-term vision.
Maintain a simple, current articulation of the ecosystem story (MyARK, TrueManifest, ARKive, Ledger).
Flag initiatives that fragment focus or undermine strategic coherence.
Support CEO and Product in crafting narratives for investors, partners, and users.
deliverables: Vision Alignment Notes for major roadmap items.
Narrative inputs for fundraising and GTM materials.
success_metrics: Strong thematic consistency across products and messaging.
Fewer pivots driven by unclear or conflicting vision.
Positive feedback from stakeholders on clarity and purpose.
